Utilities (src/utils)

These modules contain shared functionality for logging, formatting, and general utilities across the NLP7 pipeline.

Helper Functions

Utility functions for logging, time formatting, and CSV handling.

src.utils.helpers.format_time(ms: int) → str[source]

Convert milliseconds to a subtitle‐style timestamp “HH:MM:SS,mmm”.

src.utils.helpers.log_message(level: str, message: str) → None[source]

Log a message at a specified severity level.

Parameters:

  • level – One of “info”, “error”, “debug”.

  • message – The log text.

src.utils.helpers.save_to_csv(df: pandas.DataFrame, filename: str = 'final_output.csv', output_dir: str | None = None) → None[source]

Save a DataFrame to CSV, prepending new rows above existing ones.

If the file already exists:

  • read it in

  • new rows go on top

  • old rows get pushed down

Parameters:

  • df – DataFrame of new rows

  • filename – CSV filename

  • output_dir – base directory (defaults to ‘src/data/processed’)

src.utils.helpers.setup_logging() → None[source]

Configure logging to output messages to both the terminal and a log file.

Creates a ‘src/logs’ directory if it doesn’t exist. Console shows INFO+, file captures DEBUG+ in ‘src/logs/app.log’.

Includes functions like:

  • load_label_encoder(path)

  • clean_text(text)

  • translate_polish_to_english(text)

Logger

Logging utility for the application.

src.utils.logger.get_logger(name: str) → Logger[source]

Retrieve a named logger.

Parameters:

name – Logger name (usually __name__).

Returns:

Configured Logger instance.

src.utils.logger.setup_logging(log_dir: str = 'src/logs', log_filename: str = 'app.log') → None[source]

Configure application-wide logging.

  • Console handler at INFO+

  • File handler capturing DEBUG+

  • Root logger at DEBUG

  • urllib3 logger elevated to INFO to suppress its DEBUGs

Parameters:

  • log_dir – Directory under which to write the log file.

  • log_filename – Name of the log file.

Wraps Python’s logging module for consistent pipeline logs.

Logs to both console and file (logs/app.log) with format: [%(asctime)s] %(levelname)s - %(name)s - %(message)s
